org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning
Class ProvisioningContextImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.ProvisioningContextImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ManagementProvisioningContext, ProvisioningContext
public class ProvisioningContextImpl
extends Object
implements ProvisioningContext, ManagementProvisioningContext

Implementation of the provisioning context interface for both agent and manager machines. Provides access to the provisioning related functionality.

Since:
2.6.1
Author:
barakme

createEnvironmentScript

public String createEnvironmentScript(org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails md,
                                      ComputeTemplate template)
                               throws FileNotFoundException
Description copied from interface: ProvisioningContext
Creates the provisioning environment script file contents for this provisioing request.

Specified by:
createEnvironmentScript in interface ProvisioningContext
Parameters:
md - the created machine node.
template - the template used with this node.
Returns:
the contents of the cloudify environment file which should be executed before the bootstrap script runs.
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - if a key file specified in the machine details does not exist.

createManagementEnvironmentScript

public String[] createManagementEnvironmentScript(org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails[] mds,
                                                  ComputeTemplate template)
                                           throws FileNotFoundException
Description copied from interface: ManagementProvisioningContext
Creates the Cloudify environment script for management machines.

Specified by:
createManagementEnvironmentScript in interface ManagementProvisioningContext
Parameters:
mds - the management machine details.
template - the template to use for these management machine.
Returns:
the contents of each of the cloudify environment files, one per management server, in the same order as the machine details that were provided..
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - If a provided key file does not exist.

getPreviousMachineDetails

public org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails getPreviousMachineDetails()
Description copied from interface: ProvisioningContext
If this provisioning request is needed to recover from the previous failure of another machine, the previous machine's details are available here. Otherwise null.

Specified by:
getPreviousMachineDetails in interface ProvisioningContext
Returns:
the machine details of the previous failed machine that the new machine will replace.
